name: Magical Marissa's Troubles withTime
description:
Controls - WASD to tilt the world in a given direction

Story: Magical Marissa cast a spell to have more time to play. Unfortunately she accidentally created a time loop of sixty seconds; as well she broke her magic wand so she can't undo the spell. Now its up to you to race against the clock and get the parts of your magic wand back before time resets and sends you back to the beginning. Can you get yourself unstuck from this loop.
